ai_summary._description: Settings for the consolidated AI summary feature.
ai_summary.summary_llm_model_description: Model used for generating summaries and tags. Must be a text generation model. Consider using mistralai/Mistral-7B-Instruct-v0.2 for better results, you can try googlke/flan-t5 models, but you need to adjust the prompt and the results may vary.
ai_summary.prompt_file_description: Path to a text file containing the prompt for summary and tag generation. Placeholders: {language}, {visual_context}, {audio_transcript}

processing._description: Settings for video processing and frame analysis.

tags._description: Settings for tag generation and language.

audio._description: Settings for audio transcription with Whisper.
